etphoneshome.managers

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • etphoneshome.managers.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class in charge of all checks within the game, checkpoints, R+P pickups, enemy kills, character damage, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • setCharacter

        public void setCharacter(Character character)

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        Invokes the processInput method from the InputListener class and checks if the character is hurt. If the character is hurt then it is set to dead and gameOver is set to true. Next the game state is printed.

      • wasCharacterHurt

        public boolean wasCharacterHurt()
        Returns whether the character was hurt or not
        Returns:
        true if the character was hurt, else false

      • getGameOver

        public boolean getGameOver()
        Returns gameOver variable
        Returns:

        Updates the gameOver variable
        Parameters:
        gameOver - New value for gameOver
